title: Identity Worker: Add email sending capability
description: Integrate email sending for verification flows. Options: Cloudflare Email Workers, Resend, or SendGrid. Need for: email verification, password reset, account deletion confirmation. Template system for branded emails.

title: Identity Worker: Add email change with verification
description: Add POST /v1/users/me/email/change endpoint. Requires password confirmation. Sends verification email to new address. Only updates email after clicking verification link. Prevents account takeover.

title: Git hook auto-sync for Beads
description: Beads changes should commit atomically with code changes via git hooks. Eliminates the manual 'bd sync && git commit && bd sync' ceremony. The tool should recede—sync happens invisibly when git operations occur.

title: Compress Maverick news images
description: news-pic-2.png is 2.1MB. Should compress to <500KB for faster page loads. Consider WebP conversion.

title: Consolidate R2 buckets
description: create-something-assets vs maverick-x-assets (empty) vs templates-site-assets — evaluate consolidation. maverick-x-assets appears unused.

title: Implement CREATE SOMETHING Learn MCP Server
Phase 3: npx init command + templates
description: Create npx @create-something/learn init with CLAUDE.md and skill templates

title: Document motion patterns in CSS Canon
description: motion-analysis skill exists but CSS canon lacks animation patterns. Add: entrance/exit animations, micro-interactions, loading states. Ensure alignment with --ease-standard and --duration-* tokens.

title: Templates platform payment integration
description: Add Stripe, tenant automation, licensing model

title: Session context injection (bd prime)
description: 'bd prime' should output structured context suitable for system prompt injection. Enables true hermeneutic continuity—the agent starts with full situational awareness, not just a list of tasks. Memory persists; context compounds.

title: More vertical templates
description: Add medical, restaurant, real estate, consulting templates

title: LMS: Enhance account page with full profile management
description: Update /account page to support: password change form, email change with verification flow, avatar upload UI, account deletion with confirmation. Depends on Identity Worker enhancements.

title: Directory-aware priority scoping
description: 'bv' in a package directory should automatically weight issues labeled with that package. If I'm in /packages/maverick, Maverick issues surface first without explicit filtering. The tool reads the hermeneutic situation.

comments.author: micahjohnson
comments.text: Upstream feature request for github.com/steveyegge/beads. bv has -repo flag for filtering but no automatic directory detection. Would need to read cwd, match against package paths, and weight issues with matching labels.

title: Identity-worker: magic-login endpoint
description: POST /v1/auth/magic-login - Passwordless login for existing users

title: Silent quick-capture mode (bd q)
description: Add 'bd q "task"' for rapid capture with zero output except the ID. Not every task needs a description—the current warning doesn't earn its existence for rapid captures. Weniger, aber besser.

comments.author: micahjohnson
comments.text: Upstream feature request for github.com/steveyegge/beads. The -q/--quiet flag exists but doesn't suppress success output, only errors. Request: 'bd q "task"' alias that outputs only the issue ID.

LMS: Investigate Navigation/Footer display issue
description: User reports Navigation/Footer not displaying as expected on LMS (learn.createsomething.space). Initial investigation shows HTML structure is identical to IO property - both use same shared components (Navigation.svelte, Footer.svelte) from @create-something/components. Scoped CSS classes match (svelte-zheslz, svelte-i3h5xa). Need clarification on specific visual issue. DNS issue: learn.createsomething.space returns 404 - custom domain not properly configured in Cloudflare Pages dashboard. pages.dev deployment (createsomething-lms.pages.dev) works correctly (HTTP 200).

title: LMS: Add Tooling Mastery path (Claude Code, WezTerm, Neomutt, Beads)
description: Teaching the holistic system architect stack: Claude Code with Max subscription, WezTerm terminal setup, Neomutt email workflow, Beads task management. Target audience: system architects who want Zuhandenheit - tools that recede into use.

description: Create lesson content for Foundations path: DRY principle, Rams (weniger aber besser), Heidegger (hermeneutic circle), the Subtractive Triad

title: Learn MCP: Add reflection analysis and methodology coaching
description:
Enhance Learn MCP to support active methodology adoption (not just passive learning):

1. Reflection analysis: Parse reflections for depth, concepts understood, and implied actions
2. Audit-based recommendations: Weak triad-audit scores surface relevant lessons
3. learn_coach tool: Real-time methodology guidance during coding
4. Ethos construction API: Users define their own principles derived from canon
5. Continuous monitoring: Weekly audit digests and trend tracking

See paper: createsomething.io/papers/ethos-transfer-agentic-engineering

Transforms Learn MCP from 'learning about' (Vorhandenheit) to 'dwelling within' (Zuhandenheit).
